title: Arcade Ahri Login (A request to Riot)
body: You guys recently uploaded the Arcade Ahri login to Soundcloud. Is there any possible way you guys can upload JUST the music? I want to get this, but I really don't want the login screen, just the audio file!

replies.body: Interesting, I didn't know soundcloud supported video files. Try downloading again - we've replaced the mp4 video file with a mp3.
You guys post all your login music online? Please link I wanna play the Kled one while I'm playing Kled
Yep, you can find us on [Soundcloud](https://soundcloud.com/leagueoflegends). There are download links on each track, if you'd prefer not to stream them.
Can I just download ALL of them at once?  I honestly love the instrumentals because I can play them while doing other work etc.

Yo these are dope. Listening to Dragon Slayer Tristana atm. Sick violin or whatever. 

This is what i'm talking about bro. Thank you for investing time to make some SICK musical pieces. 
Not really expected to make sick music at a gaming studio.

Cheers.
